post.content:
Hello All....
My family had new family member, Woo Ju, in last Nov. We love Fluffy but due to new arrival of Woo Ju Fluffy became odd dog out situation.
There are three main reasons for the request -------------------------------------------- - My wife, Dianne, is quite busy with a new born - Fluffy's barking habit is not coping with Woo Ju's sleeping habit - My daught, Anabel, is busy with her teenager life.
I am looking for temp home for nice kind dog Fluffy. After three or four months we will decide the future of Fluffy's permanent home.
Fluffy : 5 years old nice small size Shiu Zhu very gentle and lovely eyes never bite
post.title: I am looking for my pet Fluffy's temp home
